name: bad-token-subgraph
author: Daniel Liu
description: The subgraph for BadToken on blockchain XinFin and Apothem

scripts.prepare:apothem: mustache networks/apothem.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.apothem.yaml && node scripts/xdc subgraph.apothem.yaml
scripts.prepare:xinfin: mustache networks/xinfin.json subgraph.template.yaml subgraph.xinfin.yaml && node scripts/xdc subgraph.xinfin.yaml
scripts.make:apothem: yarn clean && yarn prepare:apothem && yarn codegen:apothem
scripts.make:xinfin: yarn clean && yarn prepare:xinfin && yarn codegen:xinfin
scripts.make:mumbai: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mumbai && yarn codegen:mumbai
scripts.deploy:apothem: graph deploy --node http://graph-node:8020 --ipfs http://graph-node:5001 --version-label v0.0.1 gzliudan/bad-token-subgraph-apothem subgraph.apothem.yaml
scripts.deploy:xinfin: graph deploy --node http://graph-node:8020 --ipfs http://graph-node:5001 --version-label v0.0.1 gzliudan/bad-token-subgraph-xinfin subgraph.xinfin.yaml
scripts.deploy:mumbai: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ gzliudan/bad-token-mumbai subgraph.mumbai.yaml
